idea: Our business model is based on a mobile/web live streaming platform. To be precise it is facebook live + TVC + E-commerce solution across B2B sector. idea: We are a Startup engaged into Online Retail Trading of Apparel & Fashion accessories for Teenagers. The business is promoted under Woman Entrepreneurship. We will be catering to the age group of 12 to 19yrs. Our USP is to provide appealing and affordable clothing choices specific to Teenagers. We promote make in India. Our Vision is to serve best to the teenagers of the world. MIHIKASHI is a responsible brand, wherein we make environmental and kid’s friendly products locally. Technology and Innovation being core of our products.
name: MIHIKASHI PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
TunicaLabs Media is a hub for ideating, experimenting, and delivering value to the pillars of Marketing and Technology for all our clients.


We are experts in technology and marketing solutions for startups and large businesses alike. We started as a digital agency focused on paid and performance marketing solutions. We work on high-quality lead generation techniques through social, affiliate and other paid marketing channels. We also deliver quality solutions in-app and web development, data analytics, and Martech integration solutions. Through combined technology and marketing solutions, we deliver an edge to our clients which brings their business goals to life.
name: TunicaLabs Media Pvt. Ltd.
